content: Hey @Mark Drobnak left a few nits on https://github.com/rust-lang/chalk/pull/470 but otherwise looking good

error: The server responded with 404 Not Found for "https://rust-lang.github.io/chalk/chalk_engine/hh/enum.HhGoal.html"

https://github.com/rust-lang/chalk/pull/470/checks?check_run_id=710954875
Somehow these broken links weren't found in chalk#472?
I can fix them in my branch, but looking over the output of the link checker on that PR, it only has spurious errors: https://github.com/rust-lang/chalk/runs/710761075
Oops, that's my fault. Didn't change them in my PR
It wasn't an error because the current book at the time had them.
I can remove the references, but perhaps you want to update the book with the latest status?
Yeah, I'll have to go through and actually update a couple engine things probably
I saw those failures but assumed they were spurious :)
